thread.title: Ex-prosecutor who didn't charge Cosby sued for defamation
thread.title_full: Ex-prosecutor who didn't charge Cosby sued for defamation - Times Union

author: timesunion.com
title: Ex-prosecutor who didn't charge Cosby sued for defamation
text:
PHILADELPHIA (AP) â€” A woman who settled a sex abuse lawsuit against Bill Cosby has sued the former Pennsylvania prosecutor who declined to file charges, saying he has defamed her through recent attacks on her credibility.
In a lawsuit filed Monday, Andrea Constand says she has become "collateral damage" for former Montgomery County District Attorney Bruce Castor 's political ambitions. He is running to regain his seat.
Castor has defended his decision not to charge Cosby by saying Constand gave a less serious account to police than she described in her 2005 lawsuit.
She accuses Cosby of drugging and sexually assaulting her at his home near Philadelphia in January 2004. Cosby has denied it.
The current prosecutor has reopened the criminal case.
The Legal Intelligencer first reported on the Constand defamation lawsuit.
